testsuite.name: Search for solid blue shirt and check XL availability on Wrangler.in

testcase.name: Search for solid blue shirt, verify XL availability, and add to cart
testcase.classname: Search for solid blue shirt and check XL availability on Wrangler.in

failure.message: EXPECTED RESULT: Solid blue shirt product page shows size options including XL and allows adding to cart. ACTUAL RESULT: No matching product page; size options and Add to Cart button are absent.

property.name: Proofs Base Folder, includes screenshots, recording, netwrok logs, api logs, sec logs, accessibility logs
plan
property.value: 1. Navigate to https://www.wrangler.in/ and wait for the homepage to fully load. Verify expected visual signals for the homepage. 2. Close any promotional popup or banner if present. 3. Click the search icon or focus the search input field. 4. Type "solid blue shirt" into the search field and submit the query. 5. Verify that the search results page displays matching products, including a solid blue shirt. 6. Click on the first matching solid blue shirt product. 7. Verify that the product detail page shows size options including XL. 8. Check if size "XL" is available. 9. Select size "XL". 10. Click the "Add to Cart" button. 11. Verify that a success indication appears confirming the item was added to the cart. 12. Navigate to the cart page. 13. Verify that the cart displays the solid blue shirt with size "XL" and quantity 1. 14. Assert that the cart contents match the expected product, size, and quantity.

testcase.system-out: Final Response: Test failed: Expected to find a solid blue shirt product with size XL available, but the product detail page displayed a "We are sorry. No matching products found!" message and no size selectors or Add to Cart button. Unable to complete the test as specified.
